title: Concept comparison tool
goal: Help students understand differences and similarities between related concepts
prompt: Compare and contrast {concept1} and {concept2}. Create a table showing: similarities, differences, use cases, advantages, and disadvantages of each.

responses.gpt-4:
| Aspect | Photosynthesis | Cellular Respiration |
|--------|---------------|---------------------|
